sect1.title: Installation methods
sect1.para: You can choose the desired installation method by booting the setup with one of the options listed in . To enable the additional installation methods refer to . For information about how to use remote installation methods, refer to .
A brief overview of the different methods:

listitem.para: This is the method most frequently used to install &productname;. This also requires very little preparation but needs a lot of direct interaction.
You can perform installation via SSH either in text mode or use X-forwarding for a graphical installation. For details refer to .
For this installation method you need a second computer connected via a null modem cable to the target computer. The installation is done in text mode. For details refer to .
Use this method to perform the installation using a graphical interface without direct access to the target machine. For details refer to .

To install &productname; on several computers with similar hardware, it is recommended you perform the installation using &ay;. In this case, start by installing one &productname; and use it to create the necessary &ay; configuration files. For details refer to .
